description:
With its subtle look and increased performance, Ortovox's Swisswool Piz Cartas Vest for men is ready for those demanding days of ski touring when every gram counts. This practical reversible vest is impressively lightweight and offers excellent insulation. Its 90 g/m2 Swisswool lining can also absorb and release large quantities of moisture and warms even when wet.

The outer layer is made of Pertex Quantum, a breathable, windproof and extremely scuff-resistant material made from recycled polyamide.

The Swisswool Piz Cartas Vest for men now has a more relaxed look thanks to its new colors and lines. With its elasticated hem, the lightweight insulating vest adapts to fit the body perfectly. Merino mesh inserts in the large front pockets provide added comfort and keep your hands warm. The bonded breast pocket is backpack compatible and provides enough space to store a map or trail bar on your ski tour.

So with the Swisswool Piz Cartas Vest for men, you’ll be ready for any ski tour – no matter how demanding or long.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Piz Cartas Vest - Mens
